A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If this movie was called Disney Space Adevtures it would easily be 4 out of 5. the effects are great\, sets and costumes look amazing as well and if it was a generic space movie the plot holes wouldn't be a big deal\, but this is Star Wars. Without giving away spoilers major plot threads are just dropped and left unexplained from the previous\, the reunion of classic characters is underwhelming at best. It's a bit of a clusterf#%#.
